site.title: Hoergen | Worldwide Broadcast of Underground House & Techno Culture
site.description: Broadcasting culture, not just beats. Underground stations handpicked for those who still listen.

hero.title: Not algorithms. Just humans curating the deepest underground frequencies. Tap in. Stay raw. Stay real.

testimonials.quote: There’s no fake curation here. Just real stations, real sound. The chat feature makes it feel like I’m back in a warehouse party, talking music while it’s playing.
testimonials.author: Felix Jansen

testimonials.quote: Finally, a radio that gets it. No mainstream fluff, just pure underground vibes. The community is tight, and the music is even tighter.
testimonials.author: Maya Tran

testimonials.quote: The raw interface? Beautifully intentional. No distractions. I open Hörgen, hit play, and it’s like I disappear for hours — exactly how it should be.
testimonials.author: Denis Kramer

testimonials.quote: It’s the closest thing to tuning into HÖR without needing a stream link or VPN. Honest radio. Honest techno. No fluff.
testimonials.author: Anika Söldner

intro.about: Hörgen Radio is a global stream of underground energy — broadcasting handpicked stations that move with the rhythm of the moment and the mood of the night.
intro.community: We bring together electronic frequencies from across the world — from Berlin basements to late-night sets in Tokyo. Each station is selected to surprise, inspire, and pull you in. With Hörgen, you're not just listening — you're part of a living, breathing sound movement that never stops spinning.

experiences.title: Discover effortlessly:
experiences.description: Explore German techno stations with an interface that disappears to make way for the beat. Find your ideal frequency without confusing menus or visual distractions. You choose, you flow.

experiences.title: Memory in every beat:
experiences.description: Every station you tune into becomes part of your journey. Your history and favorites form a personal archive — a sonic diary of everything that’s moved you.

experiences.title: Built for ravers:
experiences.description: Dark, stripped down, and honest. Hörgen is designed like a digital club: no likes, no filters. Just raw sound, real emotion, and a space made for those who know.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Thank you for using Hörgen Radio. Your privacy is extremely important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you interact with our mobile application and related services.

sections.informationIntro: We collect the following types of information:
sections.personalDesc: Provided directly by you when signing up, logging in, or updating your profile. This may include your name, email address, and profile preferences.
sections.usageDesc: Information about how you use the app (e.g., stations played, search queries, favorites, listening history) to enhance your experience and recommend content.
sections.deviceDesc: Technical details such as device model, operating system, and app version for debugging and support.
sections.authDesc: When using features like subscriptions or account linking (e.g., Firebase Auth, Stripe), we may access authentication tokens or limited billing metadata. Sensitive information like credit card numbers is handled securely by trusted third-party providers (e.g., Stripe) and is never stored directly by us.
sections.useIntro: We use the collected information to:
useList: Provide and maintain the core functionality of Hörgen Radio
Personalize your experience and improve recommendations
Communicate important updates, promotions, or technical notices
Monitor and improve the performance, security, and reliability of our services
Comply with legal obligations and prevent misuse or fraud
sections.protectionDesc: We use modern, industry-standard security practices—including encrypted connections (HTTPS), secure Firebase infrastructure, and access controls—to protect your data. Despite our efforts, no online system can be guaranteed 100% secure.
sections.childrenDesc1: Hörgen Radio is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or store personal information from users under this age. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us immediately at contact@hoergen.com, and we will take steps to remove such information.
sections.childrenDesc2: Our mobile app includes a chat feature designed to enhance user interaction. To maintain a safe and respectful environment, we use the Perspective API (a Google-provided tool) to automatically evaluate messages for potentially harmful, toxic, or inappropriate content. This moderation system may process message content in real time but does not store or associate this data with any personally identifiable information.
sections.childrenDesc3: Users under 18 should review this policy with a parent or guardian before using the app. By using our services, you confirm that you are at least 13 years old, or that you are doing so with proper parental consent.
rightsList: Access, correct, or delete your personal information
Withdraw consent or deactivate your account at any time
Contact us with concerns or inquiries related to your data
sections.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, contact us directly at contact@hoergen.com
sections.thirdDesc: Hörgen Radio relies on services such as Firebase (for authentication, Firestore, analytics) and Stripe (for payments). These providers have their own privacy practices, and we recommend reviewing their policies to understand how they handle your information.
sections.contactDesc1: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how your data is handled, you can reach us at:
sections.contactForm: Available in the app under Settings > Help & Support.
sections.responseTime: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours.
